Monster.Name: Wolf
Monster.Description: Wolfs are found in subarctic and temperate regions of the world, running in packs through hills and forests.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
